body: Hey guys, I'm trying to model a big glass box with buildings inside like this one: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bCfB14IUU7LyYWUJ6jNpvHwUaCgFF-QGbb7G38CbCd7xNVs-PDikhYXi*e6kp0NXBGPfPs1FwkDcFIJgZJbgOQ0Hwgh0r9EC/previewxl37923.jpg)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bCfB14IUU7J8xDLAh8H94oLQYAKNwsChOj0WY4nJ0ZOFNTziMK8fCe*6zXNU6wL*JrPqBIm2BzbhTygpuSKJOqB7sRPZpzaH/previewxl37940.jpg)I would like to investigate the thermal comfort in the "3rd space". My idea is to introduce water and vegetation features to control the temperatures. Can I model their evapotranspirational abilities with HB?
topic: Water and vegetation features in Honeybee
